videoSnippet.title: Attacking Without Sacrificing pt.2 || Carlsen vs Xiong || Clutch Chess International (2020)
videoSnippet.description:
Follow me on Instagram for extra content and notifications https://www.instagram.com/agadmator/
 
Magnus Carlsen vs Jeffery Xiong
Clutch Chess International (2020), 6.6.2020, GAME 3
Sicilian, Canal-Sokolsky attack, 3...Bd7 (B52)

1. Nf3 c5 2. e4 d6 3. Bb5+ Bd7 4. Bxd7+ Nxd7 5. O-O Ngf6 6. Re1 Rc8 7. c3 e6 8. d4 cxd4 9. cxd4 d5 10. e5 Ne4 11. Nbd2 Nxd2 12. Qxd2 Be7 13. Qf4 O-O 14. Qg4 Re8 15. h4 Qc7 16. Bh6 g6 17. Qf4 Qc2 18. g4 b6 19. b3 Ba3 20. Kg2 Qb2 21. Ng5 Re7 22. Rad1 Rc2 23. Re3 Rc3 24. h5 Qc2 25. Rxc3 Qxc3 26. Nxh7 Kxh7 27. Bg5 Kg8 28. Bxe7 Bxe7 29. Rc1 Qb4 30. Rc8+ Nf8 31. h6 g5 32. h7+ Kg7 33. h8=Q+ Kxh8 34. Qxf7 Qxd4 35. Rxf8+ Bxf8 36. Qxf8+ Kh7 37. Qf7+ Kh8 38. Qh5+ Kg7 39. Qxg5+ Kh7 40. Qe7+ Kh8 41. Qf6+ Kh7 42. Qxe6 Qd1 43. Qf5+ Kg8 44. e6

The $265,000 Clutch Chess International is an 8-player knockout taking place from 6-14 June, 2020, with World Champion Magnus Carlsen the top seed. Each match consists of 12 games, but with the twist that games 5-6 are worth double the points and games 11-12 triple. The "clutch" games have an extra $10,000 at stake in each match, with prizes rolled over if the games end in draws.

The time control is 10 minutes per player for all moves, with a 5 second per move increment from move 1. No draw offers are allowed before move 60. The event is organised by the Saint Louis Chess Club with the games played on lichess. Official website: uschesschamps.com

judgment.comment: Checkmate is now unavoidable. Kg7 was best.
